trans-unit.source: Add-ons: install a variety of add-ons and customize them as well as many aspects of the built-in CMS by use of an INI configuration file
trans-unit.target: 附加组件：安装各种附加组件，并使用INI配置文件自定义它们以及内置CMS的许多方面

trans-unit.source: Greatly reduce the number of queries that are sent to the DB: - Add caching for the root node. - Use eager / joined loading for local_groups. - Don’t query principals for roles
trans-unit.target: 大大减少了发送到数据库的查询数量：-为根节点添加缓存。-对local_group使用预先加载/合并加载。-不要查询委托人的角色

trans-unit.source: Internationalized: the user interface is fully translatable, Unicode is used everywhere to store data
trans-unit.target: 国际化的：用户界面是完全可翻译的，Unicode用于存储数据

trans-unit.source: Responsive design: Kotti builds on Bootstrap, which looks good both on desktop and mobile
trans-unit.target: 响应式设计：Kotti建立在Bootstrap之上，在台式机和移动设备上看起来都不错

trans-unit.source: Security: the advanced user and permissions management is intuitive and scales to fit the requirements of large organizations
trans-unit.target: 安全性：先进的用户和权限管理非常直观，并且可以扩展以适应大型组织的要求

trans-unit.source: Templating: you can extend the CMS with your own look & feel with almost no programming required
trans-unit.target: 模板：您几乎不需要编程即可以自己的外观扩展CMS

trans-unit.source: This is a alpha release. Blindly upgrading your production environments will make the universe collapse!
trans-unit.target: 这是Alpha版。盲目升级生产环境会使宇宙崩溃！

trans-unit.source: This release fixes a CSRF (Cross Site Request Forgery) security vulnerablity which was reported in #551. You should upgrade your installations ASAP.
trans-unit.target: 此版本修复了＃551中报告的CSRF（跨站点请求伪造）安全漏洞。您应该尽快升级安装。

trans-unit.source: User-friendliness: editors can edit content where it appears; thus the edit interface is contextual and intuitive
trans-unit.target: 用户友好：编辑者可以编辑内容出现的地方；因此，编辑界面是上下文和直观的

trans-unit.source: WYSIWYG editor: includes a rich text editor
trans-unit.target: 所见即所得编辑器：包括一个富文本编辑器

trans-unit.source: A high-level, Pythonic web application framework based on Pyramid and SQLAlchemy. It includes an extensible Content Management System called the Kotti CMS.
trans-unit.target: 一个基于Pyramid和SQLAlchemy的高级Pythonic网络应用框架。它包括一个名为Kotti CMS的可扩展内容管理系统。

trans-unit.source: A migration script is included, which can be executed by running
trans-unit.target: 包含了一个迁移脚本,可以通过执行

trans-unit.source: A new ‘Actions’ menu makes copy, paste, delete and rename of items more accessible.
trans-unit.target: 新的“操作”菜单使复制，粘贴，删除和重命名项目变得更加容易。

trans-unit.source: A new ‘Add’ menu in the editor toolbar allows for a more intuitive adding of items in the CMS.
trans-unit.target: 编辑器工具栏中的新“添加”菜单允许在CMS中更直观地添加项目。

trans-unit.source: A temporary fix for #187. Basically suppresses DetachedInstanceError.
trans-unit.target: 对#187的临时修复。基本上抑制了DetachedInstanceError。

trans-unit.target: 添加可以使用的“ kotti.security.has_permission”代替“ pyramid.security.has_permission”。

trans-unit.source: Add a custom traverser, which gets all nodes in a single DB query. For deeply nested trees this results in drastic performance improvements. See https://kotti.readthedocs.io/en/master/api/kotti.traversal.html for details.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个自定义遍历器，该遍历器可在单个数据库查询中获取所有节点。对于深层嵌套的树，这将显着提高性能。有关详细信息，请参见 https://kotti.readthedocs.io/en/master/api/kotti.traversal.html。

trans-unit.source: Add a fanstatic.Group ‘tagit’ and need() it in the defered widget. This is needed to make the tags widget render correctly with a theme package enabled until the defered widget is replaced by a widget class that declares its requirements in the usual deform style.

trans-unit.source: Bugfix: copy and paste of file nodes wouldn’t create a new depot file, but instead lead to multiple references to a single file which would cause undesired results when one of them was deleted later.

trans-unit.source: Kotti CMS is a content management system that’s heavily inspired by Plone. Its main features are:
trans-unit.target: Kotti CMS是一个内容管理系统，受到Plone的极大启发。其主要特点是：

trans-unit.source: Kotti is a high-level, Pythonic web application framework based on Pyramid and SQLAlchemy. It includes an extensible Content Management System called the Kotti CMS (see below).
trans-unit.target: Kotti是一个基于Pyramid和SQLAlchemy的高级Pythonic Web应用程序框架。它包括一个称为Kotti CMS的可扩展内容管理系统（请参见下文）。

trans-unit.source: Kotti is actively developed and maintained. We adhere to high quality coding standards, have an extensive test suite with high coverage and use continuous integration.
trans-unit.target: Kotti是积极开发和维护的。我们坚持高质量的编码标准，拥有覆盖面广的广泛测试套件，并使用持续集成。

trans-unit.source: Kotti is most useful when you are developing applications that
trans-unit.target: Kotti在开发以下应用时最为有用

trans-unit.source: Kotti is now based on Bootstrap 3 (and therefore Deform 2).
Kotti is offered under the BSD-derived Repoze Public License.
trans-unit.target: Kotti是根据BSD衍生的Repoze公共许可证提供的。

trans-unit.source: Kotti was created by Daniel Nouri and is currently maintained by Andreas Kaiser.
trans-unit.target: Kotti由Daniel Nouri创建,目前由Andreas Kaiser维护。

trans-unit.source: Kotti’s new default look is now even closer to the Bootstrap documentation, with the main nav bar at the very top and the edit bar right below.

trans-unit.source: Modified general search to include simple tags searching. The default search in Kotti works on a simple search term matching basis. Tags searching is added here in a simple fashion also, such that you can only search for one tag at a time, but partial matches work: searching for ‘foo’ finds content tagged ‘foo bar’. You can also search on single tags by clicking an individual tag in the tags display of an item. More sophisticated tags searching, just as for general search, is left to dedicated add-ons.
trans-unit.target: 修改了常规搜索以包括简单标签搜索。Kotti中的默认搜索基于简单的搜索词匹配。标签搜索也以一种简单的方式添加到这里，这样您一次只能搜索一个标签，但是部分匹配有效：搜索'foo'会找到标记为'foo bar'的内容。您也可以通过单击项目标签显示中的单个标签来搜索单个标签。像常规搜索一样，更复杂的标签搜索留给专用附加组件。

trans-unit.source: The difference is that Kotti’s version will set the “authorization context” to be the context that you pass to ‘has_permission’. The effect is that ‘list_groups’ will return a more correct list of local roles, i.e. the groups in the given context instead of ‘request.context’.
trans-unit.target: 区别在于Kotti的版本会将“授权上下文”设置为您传递给“ has_permission”的上下文。结果是“ list_groups”将返回更正确的本地角色列表，即给定上下文中的组，而不是“ request.context”。

trans-unit.source: There’s now proper support for nesting ‘edit_links’, so that the special ‘action_links’ list is no longer necessary. Links now also make better use of templates for rendering, and are probably easier to customize overall.
trans-unit.target: 现在已经对嵌套“ edit_links”提供了适当的支持，因此不再需要特殊的“ action_links”列表。现在，链接还可以更好地利用模板进行渲染，并且可能更容易进行整体自定义。

trans-unit.source: To make existent Kotti’s instances using default workflow compatibles and avoid users that have ‘editor’ role (and so far, whom have the possibility to edit and delete the content) to not be able to delete contents, it’s needed to reset workflow with “kotti-reset-workflow <application ini file>” command.
trans-unit.target: 为了使用默认的工作流程兼容性使现有Kotti实例兼容，并避免具有“编辑”角色的用户（到目前为止，他们有可能编辑和删除内容）无法删除内容，需要使用“ kotti”重置工作流程-reset-workflow <应用程序ini文件>”命令。

trans-unit.source: Use declarative style instead of class mapper for SQLAlchemy resources.
trans-unit.target: 对SQLAlchemy资源使用声明式风格代替类映射器。

trans-unit.source: Use generic SQLAlchemy type Text as base type for JsonType. This allows SQLAlchemy to map Text type to the most suitable type available on given database system. Previously used TEXT type is not available in Oracle database. In case of existing installation of Kotti with database system, for which SQLAlchemy maps generic Text type to type different than TEXT it’s necessary to either convert existing columns “nodes._acl” and “nodes.annotations” to that type or configure SQLAlchemy to map generic Text type to existing type of these two columns. For example of how to do this please see http://stackoverflow.com/a/36506666/95735. For all database systems for which SQLAlchemy provides dialects except Oracle (Firebird, Microsoft SQL Server, MySQL, Postgres, SQLite, Sybase) there’s no need to do anything.
trans-unit.target: 使用通用SQLAlchemy类型的Text作为JsonType的基本类型。这允许SQLAlchemy将Text类型映射到给定数据库系统上可用的最合适的类型。以前使用的TEXT类型在Oracle数据库中不可用。如果现有的Kotti与数据库系统一起安装，且SQLAlchemy将通用Text类型映射为不同于TEXT的类型，则必须将现有列“ nodes._acl”和“ nodes.annotations”转换为该类型，或者将SQLAlchemy配置为映射通用将文本类型更改为这两列的现有类型。有关如何执行此操作的示例，请参见http://stackoverflow.com/a/36506666/95735。对于SQLAlchemy提供方言的所有数据库系统（Oracle）（Firebird，Microsoft SQL Server，MySQL，Postgres，SQLite，Sybase），无需执行任何操作。
